label: DeliveryAdjustment
comment: A correction or modification to reflect actual delivery conditions.

datatypeProperties.comment: An actual date, time, date time, or other date time value of this financial booking.
The code specifying a reason for this delivery adjustment.
A reason, expressed as text, for this cancellation status.

objectProperties.comment: An actual monetary value added or subtracted as a result of this delivery adjustment.
The actual quantity added or subtracted as a result of this delivery adjustment.
